root.name: The Shadows of Mordor
root.description: OverviewThe Shadows of Mordor is a text adventure game based on the Two Towers developed by Beam Software for multiple platforms.In The Shadows of Mordor the player can choose either Samwise or Frodo as their character. There are various times throughout the game that will have a graphic to go along with the scene. In Shadows of Mordor there are some events that will happen in real time. If the player takes too long to make decisions or actions it will change some aspects.
